ygData.subject: RE: Unfinished Blade Mold
ygData.msgSnippet: I also have an Unfinished Blade Mold. Does anybody have an answer to what it s use is?
ygData.messageBody:
I also have an Unfinished Blade Mold. Does anybody have an answer to what
it's use is?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: vengence@... [SMTP:vengence@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 5:33 PM
> To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Unfinished Blade Mold
>
> From: vengence@...
>
> I just recently turned in one of the task master earrings to the Dwarven
> smith in CB. He rewarded me with an unfinished blade mold. I am curious
> if this is a working item and if so were can I find information on how to
> use it? I had hoped that he would tell me what I would need to use this
> item…but he said nothing. I have a smithing skill of 110 and
> climbing so I am willing to bet that I can make something with it if it is
> working but I really hate to waste the time and money trying to make
> something when I know I will lose the mold if I try to make anything!
> Please any hints or tips would be very very appreciated!!!
>
> Thank you,
>
> Jay Viglione
> Belrin 14th Rank Cleric of Kaladim on the Karana Server
>
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
> http://www.onelist.com
> Are you? If not, see our homepage for details.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
